item.title: Bootstraping a production-ready django project
item.description: If you have some experience with django and feel that the django django-admin startproject command is too light for you, then cookiecuter-django might be just what you are looking for.

item.title: Fuzzy-Couscous - The CLI for a better django development experience
item.description: A cli tool to bootstrap your django projects and enhance your development experience.

item.title: htmx support in pycharm
item.description: Throughout this quick guide, we will see how to add htmx support (documentation and autocompletion) in pycharm.

item.title: Easy database and migrations reset during development
item.description: Remove all your django migrations files with one commmand.
